00020 void m3mult(const double A[3][3], complex double x[3])
00021 {
00022   complex double y[3];
00023   int i,j;
00024 
00025   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00026     y[i] = 0.0;
00027     for (j=0; j<3; j++) 
00028       y[i] += A[i][j]*x[j];
00029   }
00030   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00031     x[i] = y[i];
00032 }

00035 void cm2mult(const complex double A[2][2], complex double x[2])
00036 {
00037   complex double y[2];
00038   int i,j;
00039 
00040   for (i=0; i<2; i++) {
00041     y[i] = 0.0;
00042     for (j=0; j<2; j++) 
00043       y[i] += A[i][j]*x[j];
00044   }
00045   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00046     x[i] = y[i];
00047 }

00050 void rotatemat2(const double euler[3], complex double rmat2[2][2])
00051 {
00052   double a = euler[0]; double b = euler[1]; double g = euler[2];
00053   rmat2[0][0] = cos(0.5*b)*cexp(-I*0.5*(a+g));
00054   rmat2[0][1] = -sin(0.5*b)*cexp(-I*0.5*(a-g));
00055   rmat2[1][0] = sin(0.5*b)*cexp(I*0.5*(a-g));
00056   rmat2[1][1] = cos(0.5*b)*cexp(I*0.5*(a+g));
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void derivrotatemat2(const double euler[3], complex double drmat2[3][2][2])
00061 {
00062   double a = euler[0]; double b = euler[1]; double g = euler[2];
00063 
00064   // derivative with respect to a
00065   drmat2[0][0][0] = -0.5*I*cos(0.5*b)*cexp(-I*0.5*(a+g));
00066   drmat2[0][0][1] = +0.5*I*sin(0.5*b)*cexp(-I*0.5*(a-g));
00067   drmat2[0][1][0] = +0.5*I*sin(0.5*b)*cexp(I*0.5*(a-g));
00068   drmat2[0][1][1] = +0.5*I*cos(0.5*b)*cexp(I*0.5*(a+g));
00069 
00070   // derivative with respect to b
00071   drmat2[1][0][0] = -0.5*sin(0.5*b)*cexp(-I*0.5*(a+g));
00072   drmat2[1][0][1] = -0.5*cos(0.5*b)*cexp(-I*0.5*(a-g));
00073   drmat2[1][1][0] = +0.5*cos(0.5*b)*cexp(I*0.5*(a-g));
00074   drmat2[1][1][1] = -0.5*sin(0.5*b)*cexp(I*0.5*(a+g));
00075 
00076   // derivative with respect to g
00077   drmat2[2][0][0] = -0.5*I*cos(0.5*b)*cexp(-I*0.5*(a+g));
00078   drmat2[2][0][1] = -0.5*I*sin(0.5*b)*cexp(-I*0.5*(a-g));
00079   drmat2[2][1][0] = -0.5*I*sin(0.5*b)*cexp(I*0.5*(a-g));
00080   drmat2[2][1][1] = +0.5*I*cos(0.5*b)*cexp(I*0.5*(a+g));
00081 }

00084 void rotatemat3(const double euler[3], double rmat3[3][3])
00085 {
00086   double a = euler[0]; double b = euler[1]; double g = euler[2];
00087 
00088   rmat3[0][0] = cos(g)*cos(b)*cos(a)-sin(g)*sin(a);
00089   rmat3[0][1] = -sin(g)*cos(b)*cos(a)-cos(g)*sin(a);
00090   rmat3[0][2] = sin(b)*cos(a);
00091   rmat3[1][0] = cos(g)*cos(b)*sin(a)+sin(g)*cos(a);
00092   rmat3[1][1] = -sin(g)*cos(b)*sin(a)+cos(g)*cos(a);
00093   rmat3[1][2] = sin(b)*sin(a);
00094   rmat3[2][0] = -cos(g)*sin(b);
00095   rmat3[2][1] =  sin(g)*sin(b);
00096   rmat3[2][2] = cos(b);
00097 }

00100 void derivrotatemat3(const double euler[3], double drmat3[3][3][3])
00101 {
00102   double a = euler[0]; double b = euler[1]; double g = euler[2];
00103 
00104   // derivative with respect to a
00105   drmat3[0][0][0] = -cos(g)*cos(b)*sin(a)-sin(g)*cos(a);
00106   drmat3[0][0][1] = sin(g)*cos(b)*sin(a)-cos(g)*cos(a);
00107   drmat3[0][0][2] = -sin(b)*sin(a);
00108   drmat3[0][1][0] = cos(g)*cos(b)*cos(a)-sin(g)*sin(a);
00109   drmat3[0][1][1] = -sin(g)*cos(b)*cos(a)-cos(g)*sin(a);
00110   drmat3[0][1][2] = sin(b)*cos(a);
00111   drmat3[0][2][0] = 0.0;
00112   drmat3[0][2][1] = 0.0;
00113   drmat3[0][2][2] = 0.0;
00114 
00115   // derivative with respect to b
00116   drmat3[1][0][0] = -cos(g)*sin(b)*cos(a);
00117   drmat3[1][0][1] = sin(g)*sin(b)*cos(a);
00118   drmat3[1][0][2] = cos(b)*cos(a);
00119   drmat3[1][1][0] = -cos(g)*sin(b)*sin(a);
00120   drmat3[1][1][1] = sin(g)*sin(b)*sin(a);
00121   drmat3[1][1][2] = cos(b)*sin(a);
00122   drmat3[1][2][0] = -cos(g)*cos(b);
00123   drmat3[1][2][1] =  sin(g)*cos(b);
00124   drmat3[1][2][2] = -sin(b);
00125 
00126   // derivative with respect to g
00127   drmat3[2][0][0] = -sin(g)*cos(b)*cos(a)-cos(g)*sin(a);
00128   drmat3[2][0][1] = -cos(g)*cos(b)*cos(a)+sin(g)*sin(a);
00129   drmat3[2][0][2] = 0.0;
00130   drmat3[2][1][0] = -sin(g)*cos(b)*sin(a)+cos(g)*cos(a);
00131   drmat3[2][1][1] = -cos(g)*cos(b)*sin(a)-sin(g)*cos(a);
00132   drmat3[2][1][2] = 0.0;
00133   drmat3[2][2][0] = sin(g)*sin(b);
00134   drmat3[2][2][1] = cos(g)*sin(b);
00135   drmat3[2][2][2] = 0.0;
00136 }
